quote_first:
Well, I’ve only to say I’m sorry to cause all this fuss, y’know — and, well, yes, I would like a smoke, replied the condemned man, and added hastily: “Don’t think I want to delay things for a moment though — but if there is time. . .”
“It is
quote_last: ,” said Major Ranald, “and tobacco and matches are not supposed to be found in a government jail.”
title: Driftwood Spars
author: Percival Christopher Wren
